Package org.jboss.windup.reporting.xml

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassificationExistsHandler
    Creates a ClassificationExists that searches for the given classification text.
    ClassificationHandler
    Adds the provided Classification operation to the currently selected items.
    FileExistsHandler
    Creates a FileExists that searches for the given file with filename.
    HasClassificationHandler
    Adds the provided HasClassification operation to the current iteration filter.
    HasHintHandler
    Adds the provided HasHint operation to the current iteration filter.
    HintExistsHandler
    Creates a HintExists that searches for the given hint message.
    HintHandler
    Adds the provided Classification operation to the currently selected items.
    LineitemExistsHandler
    Creates a LineitemExists that searches for the given lineitem message.
    LinkHandler
    Adds the provided Link operation to the currently selected items.
    MessageHandler
    Parses a "message" element, and returns the contents of the element as a String.
    QuickfixHandler  
    TechnologyTagExistsHandler
    Creates a TechnologyTagExists that searches for the given classification text.
    TechnologyTagHandler
